did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Special Collections and Archives.

did.unittitle: Ira E. Steele recorded sound collection
did.abstract: A collection of 7" reel-to-reel audiotapes from the 1960s and 1970s, including an audio episode of Star Trek, various Republican party speeches, and stage performances by the Beatles, Johnny Cash and Elvis.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Ira E. Steele recorded sound collection must be obtained from Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ira E. Steele recorded sound collection, C0100, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Special Collections and Archives staff. EAD markup completed by Eron Ackerman and Jordan Patty in August 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A collection of 7" audiotape reels from the 1960s and 1970s, including an audio episode of the television show "Star Trek," various speeches by Republican politicians, and stage performances by the Beatles, Johnny Cash and Elvis Presley.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections and Archives also holds the .

did.unittitle: An electronic box inventory is unavailable. Please contact speccoll@gmu.edu for more information.
